title: Constructivist Science Education Design Based on Variation Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Core scientific principles and profession-specific scientific concepts
context.additional_context: Customized science education for professionals conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can identify and analyze core variables of scientific concepts by applying variation theory
Learners can develop scientific models to solve real-world professional problems through collaborative project execution in a constructivist learning environment
Learners can build a knowledge system that integrates scientific concepts across diverse contexts into professional practice

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
